title: Why can’t Asta use magic? - Quora

response.answer_text: To be a special snowflake. It's pretty common in shonen to have the hero be some kind of underdog (naruto for instance) only to have them win through plot armor powerups about stuff within them and their super willpower. The idea is to send out the message 'even if you are bad at first you can do great things.’ Is this good or bad? No real opinion but omfg does asta have a REALLY ANNOYING VOICE. lol
